info.brief_description: Stories about cartoon characters, except unlike most stories here, nothing weird happens.
info.description:
OK, so I have found lots of interactives on this website that are things like "cartoon characters turn into babies" or "cartoon characters get fat" or whatever, so I'm writing this sort of as a joke and to break the monotony. I'm not meaning to offend anyone, you can write what you want. This just came into my head.

Rules:

1. No crossovers.
2. Stay on topic.
3. This story is rated E-- that means no explicit sex, no (explicit or not) adultery, pedophilia, incest, bestiality, or rape, no gore, no cussing.
4. This story is called Cartoon Characters Stay the Same -- This means no transformations, no OOC writing, no shipping with non-canonical partners, and no drastic changes to the character's personality/lifestyle. This applies even to the character you're not focusing on.
5. Other than that, go wild.
